verses.verse: But the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> committed<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> in the devoted thing<WH2764>; for Achan<WH5912>, the son<WH1121> of Carmi<WH3756>, the son<WH1121> of Zabdi<WH2067>, the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>, took<WH3947> of the devoted thing<WH2764>: and the anger<WH639> of Jehovah<WH3068> was kindled<WH2734> against the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> men<WH582> from Jericho<WH3405> to Ai<WH5857>, which is beside<WH5973> Beth-aven<WH1007>, on the east side<WH6924> of Beth-el<WH1008>, and spake<WH559> unto them<WH559>, saying, Go up<WH5927> and spy<WH7270> out the land<WH776>. And the men<WH582> went up<WH5927> and spied<WH7270> out Ai<WH5857>.

And they returned<WH7725> to Joshua<WH3091>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH5971>, Let not all the people go up<WH5927>; but let about two or three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men<WH376> go up<WH5927> and smite<WH5221> Ai<WH5857>; make not all the people<WH5971> to toil<WH3021> thither<WH4592>; for they are but few.
So there went up<WH5927> thither of the people<WH5971> about three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men<WH376>: and they fled<WH5127> before<WH6440> the men<WH582> of Ai<WH5857>.

And the men<WH582> of Ai<WH5857> smote<WH5221> of them about thirty<WH7970> and six<WH8337> men<WH376>; and they chased<WH7291> them from before<WH6440> the gate<WH8179> even unto Shebarim<WH7671>, and smote<WH5221> them at the descent<WH4174>; and the hearts<WH3824> of the people<WH5971> melted<WH4549>, and became as water<WH4325>.

And Joshua<WH3091> rent<WH7167> his clothes<WH8071>, and fell<WH5307> to the earth<WH776> upon his face<WH6440> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of Jehovah<WH3068> until the evening<WH6153>, he and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>; and they put<WH5927> dust<WH6083> upon their heads<WH7218>.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559>, Alas<WH162>, O Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, wherefore hast thou at all<WH5674> brought<WH5674> this people<WH5971> over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383>, to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Amorites<WH567>, to cause us to perish<WH6>? would<WH3863> that we had been content<WH2974> and dwelt<WH3427> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>!
Oh <WH994>, Lord<WH136>, what shall I say<WH559>, after that<WH310> Israel<WH3478> hath turned<WH2015> their backs<WH6203> before<WH6440> their enemies<WH341>!

For the Canaanites<WH3669> and all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> will hear<WH8085> of it<WH5437>, and will compass us round, and cut off<WH3772> our name<WH8034> from the earth<WH776>: and what wilt thou do<WH6213> for thy great<WH1419> name<WH8034>?
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Get thee up<WH6965>; wherefore art thou thus fallen<WH5307> upon thy face<WH6440>?

Israel <WH3478> hath sinned<WH2398>; yea<WH5674>, they have even transgressed my covenant<WH1285> which I commanded<WH6680> them<WH3947>: yea, they have even taken of the devoted thing<WH2764>, and have also stolen<WH1589>, and dissembled<WH3584> also<WH7760>; and they have even put it among their own stuff<WH3627>.

Therefore the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cannot<WH3201> stand<WH6965> before<WH6440> their enemies<WH341>; they turn<WH6437> their backs<WH6203> before<WH6440> their enemies<WH341>, because they are become accursed<WH2764>: I will not be with you any more<WH3254>, except<WH3808> ye destroy<WH8045> the devoted<WH2764> thing from among you<WH7130>.

Up <WH6965>, sanctify<WH6942> the people<WH5971>, and say<WH559>, Sanctify<WH6942> yourselves against to-morrow<WH4279>: for thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, There is a devoted thing<WH2764> in the midst<WH7130> of thee<WH3478>, O Israel; thou canst<WH3201> not stand<WH6965> before<WH6440> thine enemies<WH341>, until ye take away<WH5493> the devoted thing<WH2764> from among you<WH7130>.

In the morning<WH1242> therefore ye shall be brought<WH7126> near by your tribes<WH7626>: and it shall be<WH7626>, that the tribe which Jehovah<WH3068> taketh<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> near by families<WH4940>; and the family<WH4940> which Jehovah<WH3068> shall take<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> near by households<WH1004>; and the household<WH1004> which Jehovah<WH3068> shall take<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> near man<WH1397> by man<WH1397>.

So Joshua<WH3091> rose up early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242>, and brought<WH7126> Israel<WH3478> near by their tribes<WH7626>; and the tribe<WH7626> of Judah<WH3063> was taken<WH3920>:

and he brought<WH7126> near the family<WH4940> of Judah<WH3063>; and he took<WH3920> the family<WH4940> of the Zerahites<WH2227>: and he brought<WH7126> near the family<WH4940> of the Zerahites<WH2227> man<WH1397> by man<WH1397>; and Zabdi<WH2067> was taken<WH3920>:

and he brought<WH7126> near his household<WH1004> man<WH1397> by man<WH1397>; and Achan<WH5912>, the son<WH1121> of Carmi<WH3756>, the son<WH1121> of Zabdi<WH2067>, the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>, was taken<WH3920>.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto Achan<WH5912>, My son<WH1121>, give<WH7760>, I pray thee<WH3519>, glory to Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, and make<WH5414> confession<WH8426> unto him<WH5046>; and tell me now what thou hast done<WH6213>; hide it not from me<WH3582>.

And Achan<WH5912> answered<WH6030> Joshua<WH3091>, and said<WH559>, Of a truth<WH546> I have sinned<WH2398> against Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, and thus and thus have I done<WH6213>:

when I saw<WH7200> among the spoil<WH7998> a<WH259> goodly<WH2896> Babylonish<WH8152> mantle<WH155>, and two hundred<WH3967> shekels<WH8255> of silver<WH3701>, and a<WH259> wedge<WH3956> of gold<WH2091> of fifty<WH2572> shekels<WH8255> weight<WH4948>, then I coveted<WH2530> them<WH3947>, and took them<WH2934>; and, behold, they are hid in the earth<WH776> in the midst<WH8432> of my tent<WH168>, and the silver under it<WH3701>.
So Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397>, and they ran<WH7323> unto the tent<WH168>; and<WH2934>, behold, it was hid in his tent<WH168>, and the silver under it<WH3701>.

And they took<WH3947> them from the midst<WH8432> of the tent<WH168>, and brought<WH935> them unto Joshua<WH3091>, and unto all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and they laid them down<WH3332> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Joshua<WH3091>, and all Israel<WH3478> with him<WH3947>, took Achan<WH5912> the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226>, and the silver<WH3701>, and the mantle<WH155>, and the wedge<WH3956> of gold<WH2091>, and his sons<WH1121>, and his daughters<WH1323>, and his oxen<WH7794>, and his asses<WH2543>, and his sheep<WH6629>, and his tent<WH168>, and all that he had<WH5927>: and they brought them up unto the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911>.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559>, Why<WH4100> hast thou troubled<WH5916> us<WH3068>? Jehovah shall trouble<WH5916> thee this day<WH3117>. And all Israel<WH3478> stoned<WH7275> him with stones<WH68>; and they burned<WH8313> them with fire<WH784>, and stoned<WH5619> them with stones<WH68>.

And they raised<WH6965> over him a great<WH1419> heap<WH1530> of stones<WH68>, unto this day<WH3117>; and Jehovah<WH3068> turned<WH7725> from the fierceness<WH2740> of his anger<WH639>. Wherefore the name<WH8034> of that place<WH4725> was called<WH7121>, The valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911>, unto this day<WH3117>.
